game.title: The Lost Amulet
game.objective: Find the ancient amulet hidden in the jungle ruins
game.description: You have been tasked by the wise old sage to retrieve the powerful lost amulet. It is believed to be hidden deep within the mysterious jungle ruins.

task.objective: Follow the jungle markers to the entrance
task.description: Pick up the trail of ancient markings leading to the ruins.

task.objective: Search the temple ruins for a hidden chamber
task.description: Uncover the entrance to the secret chamber where the amulet is believed to be kept.
task.location: Ruins of the Temple of Elders

task.objective: Battle the guardian protecting the amulet
task.description: Confront and defeat the magical creature guarding the ancient artifact.
